00018 Boo_ClassLoader::load('Html_Input_Button');
00019 Boo_ClassLoader::load('Html_Input_Checkbox');
00020 Boo_ClassLoader::load('Html_Input_File');
00021 Boo_ClassLoader::load('Html_Input_Hidden');

00028 
00029 class Boo_Html_Input extends Boo_Html_FormControl {
00030     /**
00031      * @brief The constructor.
00032      * @brief string $type (optional) Type type of input.
00033      * @return void.
00034      */
00035     public function __construct($type = 'text') {
00036         $this->setAttr('type', $type);
00037         parent::__construct('input');
00038     }
00039     
00040     /**
00041      * @brief Sets the inputs stickiness.
00042      * @param bool $opt If input is sticky or not.
00043      * @return bool TRUE.
00044      */
00045     public function setSticky($opt) {
00046         $this->sticky = (bool) $opt;
00047         return true;
00048     }
00049     
00050     /**
00051      * @brief Returns inputs stickiness.
00052      * @return bool TRUE if input is sticky, FALSE otherwise.
00053      */
00054     public function isSticky() { return $this->sticky; }
00055     
00056     /**
00057      * @brief Extends parent method.
00058      * @see Boo_Html::htmlOpen().
00059      * @return string Opening HTML tag for the element.
00060      */
00061     public function htmlOpen() {
00062         
00063         if ($this->isSticky()) {
00064             // input is sticky
00065             $type = strtolower($this->getAttr('type'));
00066             $name = $this->getAttr('name');
00067             
00068             // remove [] from name
00069         //  if (substr($name, -2) == '[]') {
00070         //      $name = substr($name, 0, strlen($name) - 2);
00071         //  }
00072             
00073             
00074     //      echo "$name</br>";
00075             
00076     //      echo "value:" . _post($name);
00077             
00078         //  echo "</br><br>";
00079             
00080             // check to make sure the name attribute is set
00081             if (!$name) {
00082                 // name is not set
00083                 trigger_error('Attribute name is required for sticky inputs', E_USER_WARNING);
00084                 return false;
00085             }
00086             
00087             // check to make sure the type attribute is set
00088             if (!$type) {
00089                 // type is not set
00090                 trigger_error('Attribute type is required for sticky inputs', E_USER_WARNING);
00091                 return false;
00092             }
00093             $value = $this->getAttr('value');
00094             //$postValue = htmlentities(_post($name), ENT_NOQUOTES, 'UTF-8');
00095             
00096             $isArray = is_array(_post($name));
00097             $postValue = _post($name);
00098             
00099             switch ($type) {
00100                 // buttons are not sticky since they do not appear in $_POST
00101                 case 'button':
00102                     if ($value) {
00103                         // value is already set do nothing
00104                     } else {
00105                         // set default value
00106                         $this->setAttr('value', 'Button');
00107                     }
00108                     break;
00109                     
00110                 case 'checkbox':
00111                 case 'radio':
00112                     if ($value) {
00113                         // check if posted value equals set value
00114                         // this will fail if arrays of checkboxes have the same value
00115                         if ($isArray) {
00116                             if (in_array($value, $postValue)) {
00117                                 $this->setAttr('checked', 'checked');
00118                             }
00119                         } else {
00120                             // normal
00121                             if ($postValue == $value) {
00122                                 $this->setAttr('checked', 'checked');
00123                             }
00124                         }
00125                         
00126                     } else {
00127                         // set default value
00128                         $this->setAttr('value', 'on');
00129                         if ($postValue == 'on') { // default value set last time
00130                             $this->setAttr('checked', 'checked');
00131                         }
00132                         
00133                     }
00134                     break;
00135                     
00136                 case 'image':
00137                     // images are not sticky because they do not appear in $_POST
00138                     if ($value) {
00139                         // value is already set do nothing
00140                     } else {
00141                         // set default value
00142                         $this->setAttr('value', 'Image');
00143                     }
00144                     break;
00145                     
00146                 case 'file':
00147                     // Boo_Html_Input_File has its own htmlOpen() method
00148                     return parent::htmlOpen();
00149                     break;
00150                 case 'hidden':
00151                 case 'password':
00152                 case 'text':
00153                     if ($value) {
00154                         // value is already set do nothing
00155                     } elseif ($postValue) {
00156                         // post is set so we will use that
00157                         $this->setAttr('value', $postValue);
00158                         
00159                     } else {
00160                         // no default value
00161                     }
00162                     
00163                     break;
00164                     
00165                 case 'reset':
00166                     // reset buttons are not sticky because they do not appear in $_POST
00167                     if ($value) {
00168                         // value is already set do nothing
00169                     } else {
00170                         // set default value
00171                         $this->setAttr('value', 'Reset');
00172                     }
00173                     break;
00174                 case 'submit':
00175                     if ($value) {
00176                         // value is already set do nothing
00177                     } elseif ($postValue) {
00178                         // post is set so we will use that
00179                         $this->setAttr('value', $postValue);
00180                     } else {
00181                         // set default value
00182                         $this->setAttr('value', 'Submit');
00183                     }
00184                     break;
00185                 
00186                 default: 
00187                     trigger_error("Unsupported attribute type {$type}", E_USER_WARNING);
00188                     return false;
00189                 
00190             }
00191             
00192             
00193         } else {
00194             // not sticky
00195         }
00196         
00197         return parent::htmlOpen();
00198     }
00199     
00200     
00201 }
